mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY(REPLY_NUMBER, REPLY_TITLE, REPLY_CONTENT, BOARD_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER) VALUES(SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{replyTitle}, #{replyContent}, #{boardNumber}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT R.REPLY_NUMBER, R.REPLY_TITLE, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, R.MEMBER_NUMBER, R.BOARD_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_REPLY R INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON R.REPlY_NUMBER = #{replyNumber} AND R.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER

SELECT D2.REPLY_NUMBER, D2.REPLY_TITLE, D2.REPLY_CONTENT, D2.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, D2.MEMBER_NUMBER, D2.BOARD_NUMBER, m2.MEMBER_ID, m2.MEMBER_NAME, m2.MEMBER_RANK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, D1.REPLY_NUMBER, D1.REPLY_TITLE, D1.REPLY_CONTENT, D1.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, D1.MEMBER_NUMBER, D1.BOARD_NUMBER, m1.MEMBER_ID, m1.MEMBER_NAME, m1.MEMBER_RANK FROM ( SELECT R.REPLY_NUMBER, R.REPLY_TITLE, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, R.MEMBER_NUMBER, R.BOARD_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_REPLY R INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON R.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY REPLY_UPDATE_DATE DESC ) D1 JOIN TBL_MEMBER m1 ON D1.MEMBER_NUMBER = m1.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE ROWNUM < 6 ) D2 JOIN TBL_MEMBER m2 ON D2.MEMBER_NUMBER = m2.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE R > 0

SELECT R.REPLY_NUMBER, R.REPLY_TITLE, R.REPLY_CONTENT, R.REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, R.MEMBER_NUMBER, R.BOARD_NUMBER, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_RANK FROM TBL_REPLY R INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON R.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND R.MEMBER_NUMBER = m.MEMBER_NUMBER
